definitions.definition: A member of an extinct paraphyletic class ( Placodermi ) of jawed fish with armored heads and thoraces ; the group lived during the Silurian and Devonian periods.

main_definition: ( paleontology ) A member of an extinct paraphyletic class ( Placodermi ) of jawed fish with armored heads and thoraces ; the group lived during the Silurian and Devonian periods. [from 19th c.]
